Title: The Bizarro Jerry
Plot: Kramer uses a bathroom in an office building and just begins working there. He is "TCB." Elaine sets Jerry up with a friend who is very beautiful, but she has "man hands." George uses a picture of her and passes her off as his dead finance Susan; that gets him into the "Forbidden City" where high priced models hang out. Elaine meets Kevin and some of his friends; they are the exact opposite of Jerry, George and Kramer. With Kramer working, George inside the walls and Elaine hanging out with Kevi
GuestStars: Tim DeKay, Kristin Bauer, Pat Kilbane, Kyle T. Hefner, Justina Vail, J. Patrick McCormack, Harry Murphy, Dana Patrick, Shireen Crutchfield, Robin Nance, Mark S. Larson, James Lesure, Jason Beck
